text: One day we'll get to expereice Norway's Northern Lights together 🌌
One day we'll just randomly go out for picnic 🌸
I'd love to visit Japan with you 🗾
Lindt Chocolate Factory in Belgium 🍫
Let's get lost in the streets of Tokyo, trying every vending machine snack we find 🍜🗼
One day, I’ll take you to Santorini to watch the sunset from a white rooftop 🌅🇬🇷
We should do a spontaneous weekend trip — pack light, no plan, just us and the road 🚗💨
Imagine us in Kyoto, walking through bamboo forests and sipping matcha 🍵🎋
Let’s take a hot air balloon ride over a quiet valley and wave at the clouds ☁️🎈
We’ll chase the northern lights in Iceland someday. Pinky promise 💚❄️
We’ll build a fort at home, order pizza, and call it our mini-cabin trip 🛷🍕
I want to take a photo with you on every bridge in Venice 💧📸
Let’s go to a theme park and ride every roller coaster at least twice 🎢🎉
We’ll take a cooking class together in Italy, and I’ll mess up pasta on purpose 🍝🇮🇹
I want us to try night kayaking with glowing water in Puerto Rico 🌌🛶
Let's take a train across a snowy mountain and sip cocoa like a Hallmark movie ❄️🚂
We’ll explore a local street market in a new country and buy something ridiculous 🧿🛍️
Imagine cuddling in a glass igloo while it snows outside. That’s the dream ☃️🏕️
Let’s stargaze in a desert and name our own constellations 🌠🌌
We’ll visit a castle in Scotland and pretend to be royalty for a day 🏰👑
We’ll find the weirdest Airbnb in the world and stay there. No questions asked 😅🛏️
Let’s take a sunrise hike, even if we grumble through half of it ☀️🥾
We’ll try a ‘yes day’ on vacation — say yes to every adventure that comes our way 🎫💥
One day, we’ll fly first class, toast with soda, and act like we’re VIPs 🥂✈️
